## CommonOpts interface

Common base options for all stream / subscription types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CommonOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache](./rstream.commonopts.cache.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If true (default), stream caches last received value and pushes it to new subscriberswhen they subscribe. If false, calling <code>.deref()</code> on this stream will always return <code>undefined</code>. |
|  [closeIn](./rstream.commonopts.closein.md) | <code>CloseMode</code> | If false or <code>CloseMode.NEVER</code>, the stream stays active even if all inputs are done. If true (default) or <code>CloseMode.LAST</code>, the stream closes when the last input is done. If <code>CloseMode.FIRST</code>, the instance closes when the first input is done. |
|  [closeOut](./rstream.commonopts.closeout.md) | <code>CloseMode</code> | If false or <code>CloseMode.NEVER</code>, the stream stays active once there are no more subscribers. If true (default) or <code>CloseMode.LAST</code>, the stream closes when the last subscriber has unsubscribed. If <code>CloseMode.FIRST</code>, the instance closes when the first subscriber disconnects. |
|  [id](./rstream.commonopts.id.md) | <code>string</code> | Internal ID associated with this stream. If omitted, an autogenerated ID will be used. |
